title: Sound The Battle Cry

author.name: William F. Sherwin
author.bio: William F. Sherwin was an American musician, composer, and hymn writer known for his work in Sunday school music.

lyrics:
Sound the battle cry!
See, the foe is nigh!
Raise the standard high
For the Lord;
Gird your armor on,
Stand firm, everyone;
Rest your cause upon His Holy Word.

CHORUS:
Rouse, then, soldiers,
Rally round the banner!
Ready, steady, pass the word along;
Onward, forward, shout aloud, "Hosanna!"
Christ is Captain of the mighty throng.

Strong to meet the foe,
Marching on we go,
While our cause, we know,
Must prevail;
Shield and banner bright,
Gleaming in the light,
Battling for the right,
We ne'er can fail.

O Thou God of all,
Hear us when we call;
Help us, one and all,
By Thy grace;
When the battle's done,
And the victory won,
May we wear the crown
Before Thy face.
